rows.character_text: I have 5 minutes and I would like to spend it with you, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. What would you like to do?

character_text.eng: I have 5 minutes and I would like to spend it with you, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. What would you like to do?

rows.character_text: Wonderful idea, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! I see you are taking out the yellow scarf with blue stripes on it.

character_text.eng: Wonderful idea, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! I see you are taking out the yellow scarf with blue stripes on it.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, it‚Äôs for you.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, it‚Äôs for you.

rows.character_text: Well done for getting that dress on by yourself, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. You‚Äôre learning to do so many new things for yourself!

character_text.eng: Well done for getting that dress on by yourself, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. You‚Äôre learning to do so many new things for yourself!

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, I have 5 minutes to spend one-on-one time with you. What would you like to do?

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, I have 5 minutes to spend one-on-one time with you. What would you like to do?

rows.character_text: I can‚Äôt do it!

character_text.eng: I can‚Äôt do it!

rows.character_text: Five throws in a row! You seem really proud to have made it to five!

character_text.eng: Five throws in a row! You seem really proud to have made it to five!

rows.character_text: Well done! I am very happy to be able to spend this time with you, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name.

character_text.eng: Well done! I am very happy to be able to spend this time with you, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name.

rows.character_text: It looks like you‚Äôre having a lot of fun, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It‚Äôs almost time to clean up. In 3 minutes, please put your blocks away.

character_text.eng: It looks like you‚Äôre having a lot of fun, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It‚Äôs almost time to clean up. In 3 minutes, please put your blocks away.

rows.character_text: 3 minutes are over, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Please pack away your blocks.

character_text.eng: 3 minutes are over, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Please pack away your blocks.

rows.character_text: Thank you very much for packing away the blocks when I asked you, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Because you listened so well, I will read you an extra story before bed.

character_text.eng: Thank you very much for packing away the blocks when I asked you, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Because you listened so well, I will read you an extra story before bed.

rows.character_text: Once upon a time‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: Once upon a time‚Ä¶

rows.character_text: Give it back to me!

character_text.eng: Give it back to me!

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name and @data.characters.f2_son_8.name come and help me plant these vegetables together.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name and @data.characters.f2_son_8.name come and help me plant these vegetables together.

rows.character_text: Thank you for coming to help me. We are going to grow lots of delicious vegetables together.

character_text.eng: Thank you for coming to help me. We are going to grow lots of delicious vegetables together.

rows.character_text: Hi @data.characters.f3_son_4.name, would you like to do something fun together?

character_text.eng: Hi @data.characters.f3_son_4.name, would you like to do something fun together?

rows.character_text: What would you like to do?

character_text.eng: What would you like to do?

rows.character_text: First, we hang one bed sheet from the top bunk bed. It‚Äôs our first wall! Then, maybe we can use a pillow at the bottom.

character_text.eng: First, we hang one bed sheet from the top bunk bed. It‚Äôs our first wall! Then, maybe we can use a pillow at the bottom.

rows.character_text: Well done, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! This is a wonderful bedsheet house.

character_text.eng: Well done, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! This is a wonderful bedsheet house.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, please walk slowly in the house! You‚Äôre going to break something.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, please walk slowly in the house! You‚Äôre going to break something.

rows.character_text: Are you hurt?

character_text.eng: Are you hurt?

rows.character_text: I am not happy that you broke the vase, but thank you for realising your mistake and saying sorry. Do you know how you could have prevented that from happening?

character_text.eng: I am not happy that you broke the vase, but thank you for realising your mistake and saying sorry. Do you know how you could have prevented that from happening?

rows.character_text: It‚Äôs OK, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. I‚Äôm proud that you are able to learn from your mistakes. Let‚Äôs get a broom to sweep up the pieces. We may be able to repair the vase with some glue.

character_text.eng: It‚Äôs OK, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. I‚Äôm proud that you are able to learn from your mistakes. Let‚Äôs get a broom to sweep up the pieces. We may be able to repair the vase with some glue.

rows.character_text: You are playing so nice and quiet, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name. In 5 minutes, it will be time to clean up your toys.

character_text.eng: You are playing so nice and quiet, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name. In 5 minutes, it will be time to clean up your toys.

rows.character_text: It‚Äôs time to put away your toys.

character_text.eng: It‚Äôs time to put away your toys.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, either you put away the toys now, or you won‚Äôt be able to play with your toys after dinner.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, either you put away the toys now, or you won‚Äôt be able to play with your toys after dinner.

rows.character_text:
Because you did not clean up your toys when I asked you to, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, you cannot play with your toys after dinner. 
Now please come and wash your hands.

character_text.eng:
Because you did not clean up your toys when I asked you to, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, you cannot play with your toys after dinner. 
Now please come and wash your hands.

rows.character_text: You are washing your hands so nicely, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name ‚Äì well done!

character_text.eng: You are washing your hands so nicely, @data.characters.f1_son_5.name ‚Äì well done!

rows.character_text: Come on, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, it's time to get ready for bed.

character_text.eng: Come on, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, it's time to get ready for bed.

rows.character_text: How can we make sure you get all your work done and still get to bed on time so that you get enough sleep?

character_text.eng: How can we make sure you get all your work done and still get to bed on time so that you get enough sleep?

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, have you started your homework yet?

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f2_son_8.name, have you started your homework yet?

rows.character_text: Look, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name, I'm ready for bed earlier tonight!

character_text.eng: Look, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name, I'm ready for bed earlier tonight!

rows.character_text: I want to play dress-up!

character_text.eng: I want to play dress-up!

rows.character_text: Thank you, I love this scarf!

character_text.eng: Thank you, I love this scarf!

rows.character_text: Let‚Äôs play with the ball outside!

character_text.eng: Let‚Äôs play with the ball outside!

rows.character_text: I see that your hands are tight and you are speaking loudly. It looks like you are upset, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. It‚Äôs not easy, let‚Äôs practise a little bit more. I know you can do it.

character_text.eng: I see that your hands are tight and you are speaking loudly. It looks like you are upset, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. It‚Äôs not easy, let‚Äôs practise a little bit more. I know you can do it.

rows.character_text: Let‚Äôs do 10!

character_text.eng: Let‚Äôs do 10!

rows.character_text: Okay.

character_text.eng: Okay.

rows.character_text: Yay!

character_text.eng: Yay!

rows.character_text: But I want it!

character_text.eng: But I want it!

rows.character_text: Ooooh yes!

character_text.eng: Ooooh yes!

rows.character_text: Build a house out of bed sheets!

character_text.eng: Build a house out of bed sheets!

rows.character_text: It's lovely to see you thinking everything through so carefully.

character_text.eng: It's lovely to see you thinking everything through so carefully.

rows.character_text: Can we read our bedtime story here tonight?

character_text.eng: Can we read our bedtime story here tonight?

rows.character_text: I am just going to get my book quickly!

character_text.eng: I am just going to get my book quickly!

rows.character_text: No, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. I‚Äôm so, so sorry for breaking the vase‚Ä¶ I didn‚Äôt see it.

character_text.eng: No, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. I‚Äôm so, so sorry for breaking the vase‚Ä¶ I didn‚Äôt see it.

rows.character_text: Yes, I should have listened. I continued running even after you asked me to walk in the house.

character_text.eng: Yes, I should have listened. I continued running even after you asked me to walk in the house.

rows.character_text: Okay‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: Okay‚Ä¶

rows.character_text: No. Not yet!

character_text.eng: No. Not yet!

rows.character_text: No, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! I don‚Äôt want to! I‚Äôm not finished with my game.

character_text.eng: No, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! I don‚Äôt want to! I‚Äôm not finished with my game.

rows.character_text: But I still have so much homework to do!

character_text.eng: But I still have so much homework to do!

rows.character_text: Maybe I can start earlier?

character_text.eng: Maybe I can start earlier?

rows.character_text: I'll start now, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name. Could you help me with this one problem? I was having trouble with it yesterday.

character_text.eng: I'll start now, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name. Could you help me with this one problem? I was having trouble with it yesterday.

rows.character_text: Well done, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name. I‚Äôm proud that we figured that problem out together. Now you can be well-rested for tomorrow, and your homework is done!

character_text.eng: Well done, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name. I‚Äôm proud that we figured that problem out together. Now you can be well-rested for tomorrow, and your homework is done!

rows.character_text: Wear it, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name!

character_text.eng: Wear it, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name!

rows.character_text: Great idea! What do we need to do first?

character_text.eng: Great idea! What do we need to do first?

rows.character_text: Hmm, this is the third night in a row that you haven‚Äôt gone to bed on time because of homework.

character_text.eng: Hmm, this is the third night in a row that you haven‚Äôt gone to bed on time because of homework.

rows.character_text: Shall we make a rule that you start your homework half an hour after you get home from school? That way, you can finish it and have some time to eat and relax before bed, too!

character_text.eng: Shall we make a rule that you start your homework half an hour after you get home from school? That way, you can finish it and have some time to eat and relax before bed, too!

rows.character_text: Of course, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name.

character_text.eng: Of course, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name.

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, come and play with me and my dolls!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, come and play with me and my dolls!

rows.character_text: (ü§î_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww‚Ä¶ Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

character_text.eng: (ü§î_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww‚Ä¶ Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

rows.character_text: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.

character_text.eng: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: What a pretty doll you have, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Does she have a name?

character_text.eng: What a pretty doll you have, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Does she have a name?

rows.character_text: Hmmm, I will name her @data.characters.doll_name.name!

character_text.eng: Hmmm, I will name her @data.characters.doll_name.name!

rows.character_text: (ü§î_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

character_text.eng: (ü§î_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

rows.character_text: You found one striped sock and one with dots. Let‚Äôs find socks that match.

character_text.eng: You found one striped sock and one with dots. Let‚Äôs find socks that match.

rows.character_text: Another sock! This one is white. It‚Äôs frustrating to try to find a matching pair when there are so many clothes to look through.

character_text.eng: Another sock! This one is white. It‚Äôs frustrating to try to find a matching pair when there are so many clothes to look through.

rows.character_text: You are being very patient and looking very hard, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name. Well done for trying. I am happy you are helping me.

character_text.eng: You are being very patient and looking very hard, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name. Well done for trying. I am happy you are helping me.

rows.character_text:
You found two socks with the same pattern! Well done for not giving up, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! 

Because you helped me so well, I now have 5 extra minutes to play with you. What would you like to do?

character_text.eng:
You found two socks with the same pattern! Well done for not giving up, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! 

Because you helped me so well, I now have 5 extra minutes to play with you. What would you like to do?

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, it is important that you get your homework done so you can do well in school. Let‚Äôs make a rule about watching TV so that you have enough time for homework, too.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, it is important that you get your homework done so you can do well in school. Let‚Äôs make a rule about watching TV so that you have enough time for homework, too.

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: What do you think would be a fair rule?

character_text.eng: What do you think would be a fair rule?

rows.character_text: Hmmm‚Ä¶ Maybe I can watch TV as much as I want, but only after I do my homework?

character_text.eng: Hmmm‚Ä¶ Maybe I can watch TV as much as I want, but only after I do my homework?

rows.character_text: I like that idea, but let‚Äôs limit it to 30 minutes per day so that you have time for other fun and relaxing things too. How does that sound?

character_text.eng: I like that idea, but let‚Äôs limit it to 30 minutes per day so that you have time for other fun and relaxing things too. How does that sound?

rows.character_text: That‚Äôs okay.

character_text.eng: That‚Äôs okay.

rows.character_text:
Thank you for doing your homework before watching TV, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. 
Last night, you mentioned that your math tests have become easier for you. I am proud of you! We can increase your TV time to 45 minutes each day‚Ä¶ as long as you still do your homework first.

character_text.eng:
Thank you for doing your homework before watching TV, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. 
Last night, you mentioned that your math tests have become easier for you. I am proud of you! We can increase your TV time to 45 minutes each day‚Ä¶ as long as you still do your homework first.

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name!

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name!

rows.character_text: I am so happy to see you playing quietly with your building blocks, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. In 5 minutes, it will be time to get ready for bed. When you are ready for bed, we can read a story together.

character_text.eng: I am so happy to see you playing quietly with your building blocks, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. In 5 minutes, it will be time to get ready for bed. When you are ready for bed, we can read a story together.

rows.character_text: Okay!

character_text.eng: Okay!

rows.character_text: Time to get ready for bed, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. First, let‚Äôs get you nice and clean with a bath.

character_text.eng: Time to get ready for bed, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. First, let‚Äôs get you nice and clean with a bath.

rows.character_text: You were so well-behaved in the bath, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Now it is time to put your pyjamas on.

character_text.eng: You were so well-behaved in the bath, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Now it is time to put your pyjamas on.

rows.character_text: Well done for putting on your pyjamas by yourself, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! Now let‚Äôs brush your teeth. Make sure you get the ones in the back of your mouth too!

character_text.eng: Well done for putting on your pyjamas by yourself, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! Now let‚Äôs brush your teeth. Make sure you get the ones in the back of your mouth too!

rows.character_text: You did so well getting ready for bed! Now, we have time to read a story. Which book would you like to read?

character_text.eng: You did so well getting ready for bed! Now, we have time to read a story. Which book would you like to read?

rows.character_text: Yay! Can you read me the story about the lion?

character_text.eng: Yay! Can you read me the story about the lion?

rows.character_text: ‚ÄúThe end‚Ä¶‚Äù I‚Äôm glad you chose that story for us to read, it‚Äôs one of my favourites! Goodnight, my dear. I love you very much.

character_text.eng: ‚ÄúThe end‚Ä¶‚Äù I‚Äôm glad you chose that story for us to read, it‚Äôs one of my favourites! Goodnight, my dear. I love you very much.

rows.character_text: Goodnight, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Goodnight, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

rows.character_text: That looks fun! What are you watching?

character_text.eng: That looks fun! What are you watching?

rows.character_text: This guy on TikTok gets a million likes on every post! My friends and I make our own videos too.

character_text.eng: This guy on TikTok gets a million likes on every post! My friends and I make our own videos too.

rows.character_text: That‚Äôs exciting! What do you like about making videos yourself?

character_text.eng: That‚Äôs exciting! What do you like about making videos yourself?

rows.character_text: It‚Äôs fun to create them with my friends. And people comment on them a lot. I already have 600 followers!

character_text.eng: It‚Äôs fun to create them with my friends. And people comment on them a lot. I already have 600 followers!

rows.character_text: Wow, that must feel great. It‚Äôs exciting when other people like what we do. At the same time, it is important to make sure Tiktok is fun and safe for you. Do you have any ideas of how we could do that?

character_text.eng: Wow, that must feel great. It‚Äôs exciting when other people like what we do. At the same time, it is important to make sure Tiktok is fun and safe for you. Do you have any ideas of how we could do that?

rows.character_text: Sometimes I get mean comments, or DMs from people I don‚Äôt even know. Maybe I should block them?

character_text.eng: Sometimes I get mean comments, or DMs from people I don‚Äôt even know. Maybe I should block them?

rows.character_text: Yes, that‚Äôs a really good idea. Do you know how to block people? We can look it up together if you like? I am sure there are other steps too, like making your account private or limiting who can comment.

character_text.eng: Yes, that‚Äôs a really good idea. Do you know how to block people? We can look it up together if you like? I am sure there are other steps too, like making your account private or limiting who can comment.

rows.character_text: Yes, let‚Äôs look it up together, thank you @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name

character_text.eng: Yes, let‚Äôs look it up together, thank you @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name

rows.character_text: I am glad we can talk about this, @data.characters.f1_son_14.name. If something ever feels wrong, remember you can always come to me. We will figure it out together, and you can keep enjoying TikTok safely.

character_text.eng: I am glad we can talk about this, @data.characters.f1_son_14.name. If something ever feels wrong, remember you can always come to me. We will figure it out together, and you can keep enjoying TikTok safely.

rows.character_text: (_thinking_) I am so worried about Lerato. She has been acting differently lately. She seems quiet and keeps to herself.

character_text.eng: (_thinking_) I am so worried about Lerato. She has been acting differently lately. She seems quiet and keeps to herself.

rows.character_text: Mother, guess what happened at school. My classmate Sima shared a sexy picture of herself with her boyfriend to prove that she loves him, and his friends told him to post it online. Now it is everywhere.

character_text.eng: Mother, guess what happened at school. My classmate Sima shared a sexy picture of herself with her boyfriend to prove that she loves him, and his friends told him to post it online. Now it is everywhere.

rows.character_text: Send me another picture or I‚Äôll share the last one with your family and friends‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: Send me another picture or I‚Äôll share the last one with your family and friends‚Ä¶

rows.character_text: (_thinking_): What if my friends and family see those other pictures I sent‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt know what to do! Maybe I should talk to my father.

character_text.eng: (_thinking_): What if my friends and family see those other pictures I sent‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt know what to do! Maybe I should talk to my father.

rows.character_text: Why is your son showing my daughter those pictures at school!

character_text.eng: Why is your son showing my daughter those pictures at school!

rows.character_text: I saw your profile. We are at the same school! Let‚Äôs chat privately, I‚Äôll send you data.

character_text.eng: I saw your profile. We are at the same school! Let‚Äôs chat privately, I‚Äôll send you data.

rows.character_text: I should also speak with my grandchildren to choose things that we can spend just a little bit less on each week. They will help me think of things we want but do not need.

character_text.eng: I should also speak with my grandchildren to choose things that we can spend just a little bit less on each week. They will help me think of things we want but do not need.

rows.character_text: I would really like that, thank you. What would you like to do?

character_text.eng: I would really like that, thank you. What would you like to do?

rows.character_text: Maybe I can watch the soccer match with my friends on the weekend and catch up?

character_text.eng: Maybe I can watch the soccer match with my friends on the weekend and catch up?

rows.character_text: That sounds like a great plan. You are always taking care of everybody, it is important that you also take care of yourself.

character_text.eng: That sounds like a great plan. You are always taking care of everybody, it is important that you also take care of yourself.

rows.character_text: Can I have money to buy some airtime?

character_text.eng: Can I have money to buy some airtime?

rows.character_text: Leave me alone and mind your own business!

character_text.eng: Leave me alone and mind your own business!

rows.character_text: What did I do? You never listen!

character_text.eng: What did I do? You never listen!

rows.character_text: I said leave me alone or you will get a beating!

character_text.eng: I said leave me alone or you will get a beating!

rows.character_text: Look! I have made a house!

character_text.eng: Look! I have made a house!

rows.character_text: Who cares about your stupid house!

character_text.eng: Who cares about your stupid house!

rows.character_text: Can I have money to buy some airtime?

character_text.eng: Can I have money to buy some airtime?

rows.character_text: *(taking a breath)* I‚Äôm sorry son. I had a difficult day today. The boss fired me.

character_text.eng: *(taking a breath)* I‚Äôm sorry son. I had a difficult day today. The boss fired me.

rows.character_text: Oh no! I need a new school uniform.

character_text.eng: Oh no! I need a new school uniform.

rows.character_text: I‚Äôll try, son, and your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name's job will help us get by while I look for another job.

character_text.eng: I‚Äôll try, son, and your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name's job will help us get by while I look for another job.

rows.character_text: Should I also help you look for work, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name?

character_text.eng: Should I also help you look for work, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name?

rows.character_text: No it‚Äôs okay, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name. I appreciate your offer. The most important thing is that you work hard at school. Thanks for listening to me.

character_text.eng: No it‚Äôs okay, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name. I appreciate your offer. The most important thing is that you work hard at school. Thanks for listening to me.

rows.character_text: Let‚Äôs play some soccer together. It will help me get this stress off my mind for a bit.

character_text.eng: Let‚Äôs play some soccer together. It will help me get this stress off my mind for a bit.

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name!

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name!

rows.character_text: Something happened when I was out with my friends @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name and @data.characters.friend_female_1.name!

character_text.eng: Something happened when I was out with my friends @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name and @data.characters.friend_female_1.name!

rows.character_text: Tell me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

character_text.eng: Tell me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

rows.character_text:
Pfff, I am so proud of you for not getting into the car. That was a dangerous situation, thank you for telling me!

You can always call me or talk to me when something like this happens. We can even use a Safety Word, so I know something is wrong - and I promise I will not be angry.

character_text.eng:
Pfff, I am so proud of you for not getting into the car. That was a dangerous situation, thank you for telling me!

You can always call me or talk to me when something like this happens. We can even use a Safety Word, so I know something is wrong - and I promise I will not be angry.

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name! Our Safety Word could be ‚Äòblue house‚Äô. I could call and say something like ‚ÄòI forgot my book at the blue house‚Äô and you would know to come help me.

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name! Our Safety Word could be ‚Äòblue house‚Äô. I could call and say something like ‚ÄòI forgot my book at the blue house‚Äô and you would know to come help me.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_father.name, I am so worried about this boy. He is not doing his homework, he is only on his phone day and night. If he keeps doing this, he may fail his exams.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.name, I am so worried about this boy. He is not doing his homework, he is only on his phone day and night. If he keeps doing this, he may fail his exams.

rows.character_text: I know, @data.characters.f1_mother.name. What can we do?

character_text.eng: I know, @data.characters.f1_mother.name. What can we do?

rows.character_text: What if we talk to @data.characters.f1_son_18.name about how he can use his phone to support his schoolwork, and come up with some activities we could do together that don‚Äôt involve phones?

character_text.eng: What if we talk to @data.characters.f1_son_18.name about how he can use his phone to support his schoolwork, and come up with some activities we could do together that don‚Äôt involve phones?

rows.character_text: That is a great idea! Maybe we can both spend a bit less time on our phones as well, to set a good example for him.

character_text.eng: That is a great idea! Maybe we can both spend a bit less time on our phones as well, to set a good example for him.

rows.character_text: You are right. I always think that I am relaxing when I am on my phone, but all that scrolling actually makes my head tired.

character_text.eng: You are right. I always think that I am relaxing when I am on my phone, but all that scrolling actually makes my head tired.

rows.character_text: We‚Äôve both been struggling to relax. You enjoy having your friend over. Why don‚Äôt you invite her for Saturday?

character_text.eng: We‚Äôve both been struggling to relax. You enjoy having your friend over. Why don‚Äôt you invite her for Saturday?

rows.character_text: I would really like that, thank you, and what about you? How will you relax?

character_text.eng: I would really like that, thank you, and what about you? How will you relax?

rows.character_text: Some friends are watching the soccer match on the weekend. I should join them.

character_text.eng: Some friends are watching the soccer match on the weekend. I should join them.

rows.character_text: That sounds like a great plan. You are always taking care of everybody, it is important that you also take care of yourself.

character_text.eng: That sounds like a great plan. You are always taking care of everybody, it is important that you also take care of yourself.

rows.character_text: Thank you for doing your schoolwork, @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name, and thank you for helping your sister, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. I'm so proud of you!

character_text.eng: Thank you for doing your schoolwork, @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name, and thank you for helping your sister, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. I'm so proud of you!

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name! What time is this? You are late!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name! What time is this? You are late!

rows.character_text: Don‚Äôt make such a mess while I am cleaning the house. You are in the way!

character_text.eng: Don‚Äôt make such a mess while I am cleaning the house. You are in the way!

rows.character_text: Sorry @data.characters.f1_father.role_name ‚Äì you can go back to sleep.

character_text.eng: Sorry @data.characters.f1_father.role_name ‚Äì you can go back to sleep.

rows.character_text: It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!

character_text.eng: It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!

rows.character_text: But I need to practise for the school competition. You never let me do anything.

character_text.eng: But I need to practise for the school competition. You never let me do anything.

rows.character_text: I can explain, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I can.

character_text.eng: I can explain, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I can.

rows.character_text: Don't you talk back to me!

character_text.eng: Don't you talk back to me!

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, you broke our rule! I should take away that phone of yours and give you a hiding!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, you broke our rule! I should take away that phone of yours and give you a hiding!

rows.character_text: Arrg!! Why am I being yelled at all the time????

character_text.eng: Arrg!! Why am I being yelled at all the time????

rows.character_text: (ü§î_thinking_) That child is always making trouble.

character_text.eng: (ü§î_thinking_) That child is always making trouble.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name, it is nice to see you practise dance moves with your friend. Please take it outside so I can finish cleaning the house. Afterwards, you can show me your dance.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name, it is nice to see you practise dance moves with your friend. Please take it outside so I can finish cleaning the house. Afterwards, you can show me your dance.

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name!

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name!

rows.character_text: Thank you for practising outside while I finished cleaning, @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name. Now I have some time to watch your dance.

character_text.eng: Thank you for practising outside while I finished cleaning, @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name. Now I have some time to watch your dance.

rows.character_text: Wow, @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name! You have such good dance moves!

character_text.eng: Wow, @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name! You have such good dance moves!

rows.character_text: I am concerned that you are often still coming home late, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name. What can we do to help you remember to come home in time?

character_text.eng: I am concerned that you are often still coming home late, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name. What can we do to help you remember to come home in time?

rows.character_text: If I come home in time, maybe I can stay up 30 minutes later than usual?

character_text.eng: If I come home in time, maybe I can stay up 30 minutes later than usual?

rows.character_text: That is a good idea! And what should we do if you don‚Äôt follow the rule?

character_text.eng: That is a good idea! And what should we do if you don‚Äôt follow the rule?

rows.character_text: (mumbles) Mgmluuhm...

character_text.eng: (mumbles) Mgmluuhm...

rows.character_text: Oh come on, I know you have some ideas.

character_text.eng: Oh come on, I know you have some ideas.

rows.character_text: Okay‚Ä¶. What about, I have to do my homework?

character_text.eng: Okay‚Ä¶. What about, I have to do my homework?

rows.character_text: You have to do your homework anyway. If you forget the rule, is it fair that you will not be able to see your friends the next day?

character_text.eng: You have to do your homework anyway. If you forget the rule, is it fair that you will not be able to see your friends the next day?

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name! What time is it! It is late!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name! What time is it! It is late!

rows.character_text: Sorry @data.characters.f1_father.role_name ‚Äì you can go back to sleep.

character_text.eng: Sorry @data.characters.f1_father.role_name ‚Äì you can go back to sleep.

rows.character_text: It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!

character_text.eng: It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!

rows.character_text: I can explain, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I can.

character_text.eng: I can explain, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I can.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, it is the middle of the night and you came home later than we agreed. Whatever the reason is, you must understand that this is not acceptable. Your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name and I felt really worried.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, it is the middle of the night and you came home later than we agreed. Whatever the reason is, you must understand that this is not acceptable. Your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name and I felt really worried.

rows.character_text: My friends wanted me to stay longer. They were calling me a baby for having to go home already.

character_text.eng: My friends wanted me to stay longer. They were calling me a baby for having to go home already.

rows.character_text: I know it can be hard to say no to your friends. Let‚Äôs talk more about this in the morning when we have had some rest.

character_text.eng: I know it can be hard to say no to your friends. Let‚Äôs talk more about this in the morning when we have had some rest.

rows.character_text: I am sorry I worried you and @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: I am sorry I worried you and @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: Thank you. Now go to bed, but just to be clear, as you came home later than we agreed, you will not be allowed to see your friends tomorrow.

character_text.eng: Thank you. Now go to bed, but just to be clear, as you came home later than we agreed, you will not be allowed to see your friends tomorrow.

rows.character_text: You always come home late!

character_text.eng: You always come home late!

rows.character_text: No I don‚Äôt, I don‚Äôt even know what late means! Stop nagging me.

character_text.eng: No I don‚Äôt, I don‚Äôt even know what late means! Stop nagging me.

rows.character_text: I want you to have fun, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, but I‚Äôm also worried about you staying out late. Do you know why?

character_text.eng: I want you to have fun, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, but I‚Äôm also worried about you staying out late. Do you know why?

rows.character_text: Because you want me to have enough time for my schoolwork?

character_text.eng: Because you want me to have enough time for my schoolwork?

rows.character_text: That is right. It is also not safe in this area to be outside after sunset. What do you think would be a good time for you to be home?

character_text.eng: That is right. It is also not safe in this area to be outside after sunset. What do you think would be a good time for you to be home?

rows.character_text: I could come home at 10pm?

character_text.eng: I could come home at 10pm?

rows.character_text: That is a bit late, what about 6pm?

character_text.eng: That is a bit late, what about 6pm?

rows.character_text: Maybe we can agree I will come home at 6pm on school nights and 10pm on Fridays and Saturdays?

character_text.eng: Maybe we can agree I will come home at 6pm on school nights and 10pm on Fridays and Saturdays?

rows.character_text: Yes, great. From now on, our household rule is that you need to come home at 6pm on school nights and 10pm on Fridays and Saturdays. But you always walk home with a friend. Okay?

character_text.eng: Yes, great. From now on, our household rule is that you need to come home at 6pm on school nights and 10pm on Fridays and Saturdays. But you always walk home with a friend. Okay?

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: Thank you very much, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for helping to come up with a good rule together. I am proud to see how responsible you are getting.

character_text.eng: Thank you very much, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for helping to come up with a good rule together. I am proud to see how responsible you are getting.

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for coming home on time. After you finish your schoolwork, we can have your favourite meal for dinner.

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for coming home on time. After you finish your schoolwork, we can have your favourite meal for dinner.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, can I talk to you about something?

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, can I talk to you about something?

rows.character_text: (_calmly_) Sure, my darling. What is the matter?

character_text.eng: (_calmly_) Sure, my darling. What is the matter?

rows.character_text: @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name wants us to study together tomorrow. I really like him but I am not sure what to do.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name wants us to study together tomorrow. I really like him but I am not sure what to do.

rows.character_text: (ü§î_thinking to herself_) How has my daughter grown up so fast? What now? Take a deep breath‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: (ü§î_thinking to herself_) How has my daughter grown up so fast? What now? Take a deep breath‚Ä¶

rows.character_text:
(_calmly_) Thank you for sharing this with me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. I know that you like @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name a lot, he is a charming boy and he does great at school, but you are only 16 and he is 18.

I feel worried that it is not safe for you to be alone with him. He might pressure you into doing something that you are not prepared to do.

I don‚Äôt want to tell you who you can see but we need to have some rules about how you spend time together.

character_text.eng:
(_calmly_) Thank you for sharing this with me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. I know that you like @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name a lot, he is a charming boy and he does great at school, but you are only 16 and he is 18.

I feel worried that it is not safe for you to be alone with him. He might pressure you into doing something that you are not prepared to do.

I don‚Äôt want to tell you who you can see but we need to have some rules about how you spend time together.

rows.character_text: What do you think would be a fair rule about how you spend time together?

character_text.eng: What do you think would be a fair rule about how you spend time together?

rows.character_text: How about, we can spend time together if there is an adult with us?

character_text.eng: How about, we can spend time together if there is an adult with us?

rows.character_text: That would be fine as long as his parents also know. I will chat with his mother when I see her later today. And after you get back, we can talk about how it went.

character_text.eng: That would be fine as long as his parents also know. I will chat with his mother when I see her later today. And after you get back, we can talk about how it went.

rows.character_text: _(hugs @data.characters.f1_mother.name)_ Okay. Thank you for coming up with a plan together, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: _(hugs @data.characters.f1_mother.name)_ Okay. Thank you for coming up with a plan together, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f2_son_15.name! Look at all those dishes, why did you not wash those like we agreed!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f2_son_15.name! Look at all those dishes, why did you not wash those like we agreed!

rows.character_text: Sorry, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name‚Ä¶ I can explain, there is this guy from my class, on WhatsApp he‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: Sorry, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name‚Ä¶ I can explain, there is this guy from my class, on WhatsApp he‚Ä¶

rows.character_text: (_thinking_): Let me take a pause‚Ä¶ just breathe‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: (_thinking_): Let me take a pause‚Ä¶ just breathe‚Ä¶

rows.character_text: I am sorry, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

character_text.eng: I am sorry, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

rows.character_text: Now tell me, what happened on WhatsApp?

character_text.eng: Now tell me, what happened on WhatsApp?

rows.character_text: This boy in class shared a video of me in a WhatsApp group, and now everyone is making fun of me.

character_text.eng: This boy in class shared a video of me in a WhatsApp group, and now everyone is making fun of me.

rows.character_text: I am sorry to hear that, but I am glad you told me, @data.characters.f2_son_15.name. It does not mean you can leave your chores. After we speak, you need to do the dishes so I can make dinner. But first, what do you think we should do about the bully problem?

character_text.eng: I am sorry to hear that, but I am glad you told me, @data.characters.f2_son_15.name. It does not mean you can leave your chores. After we speak, you need to do the dishes so I can make dinner. But first, what do you think we should do about the bully problem?

rows.character_text: He makes me so angry, I just want to hit him. Or maybe I should tell my teacher?

character_text.eng: He makes me so angry, I just want to hit him. Or maybe I should tell my teacher?

rows.character_text: Hmm‚Ä¶ What do you think will happen if you hit him? And if you tell your teacher?

character_text.eng: Hmm‚Ä¶ What do you think will happen if you hit him? And if you tell your teacher?

rows.character_text: I don‚Äôt know. If I hit him we may get into a big fight and I could get hurt or get into trouble at school. But if I tell my teacher they may call me a snitch‚Ä¶ Maybe you could talk to the teacher?

character_text.eng: I don‚Äôt know. If I hit him we may get into a big fight and I could get hurt or get into trouble at school. But if I tell my teacher they may call me a snitch‚Ä¶ Maybe you could talk to the teacher?

rows.character_text: That sounds like a good idea. I could also go talk to his parents if you want me to.

character_text.eng: That sounds like a good idea. I could also go talk to his parents if you want me to.

rows.character_text: No @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, please don‚Äôt! Maybe I can skip school tomorrow instead?

character_text.eng: No @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, please don‚Äôt! Maybe I can skip school tomorrow instead?

rows.character_text:
No, Thabo ‚Äî you can‚Äôt miss school. 
I have an idea! Let‚Äôs practise how you might reply if classmates tease you. Do you want to try ignoring it or making a small joke?

character_text.eng:
No, Thabo ‚Äî you can‚Äôt miss school. 
I have an idea! Let‚Äôs practise how you might reply if classmates tease you. Do you want to try ignoring it or making a small joke?

rows.character_text: Maybe I‚Äôll just say, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt worry, I was testing gravity ‚Äî it still works!

character_text.eng: Maybe I‚Äôll just say, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt worry, I was testing gravity ‚Äî it still works!

rows.character_text: (laughs) That‚Äôs good! Remember, keeping calm or laughing along takes away their power.

character_text.eng: (laughs) That‚Äôs good! Remember, keeping calm or laughing along takes away their power.

rows.character_text: How are things going at school now?

character_text.eng: How are things going at school now?

rows.character_text: It is going better, the boy deleted the video from the WhatsApp group chat. But he is still being really mean to me.

character_text.eng: It is going better, the boy deleted the video from the WhatsApp group chat. But he is still being really mean to me.

rows.character_text:
I am sorry to hear that, @data.characters.f2_son_15.name. I will be speaking to your teacher tomorrow ‚Äî your school knows how to handle this safely.
If that does not work, we will try something else.

character_text.eng:
I am sorry to hear that, @data.characters.f2_son_15.name. I will be speaking to your teacher tomorrow ‚Äî your school knows how to handle this safely.
If that does not work, we will try something else.

rows.character_text: Yes, thank you, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name. At least I know you are on my side.

character_text.eng: Yes, thank you, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name. At least I know you are on my side.

rows.character_text: You cannot go out for the next month

character_text.eng: You cannot go out for the next month

rows.character_text: Uuugh‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs so unfair, I did not do anything wrong!

character_text.eng: Uuugh‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs so unfair, I did not do anything wrong!

rows.character_text: I am not trying to accuse your friend or be jealous. I am worried that when someone gives a gift it is hard to say 'no' when they ask something in return ‚Äì like sex. If you want to have a phone, we will save up together so you can make your own decisions without owing him anything.

character_text.eng: I am not trying to accuse your friend or be jealous. I am worried that when someone gives a gift it is hard to say 'no' when they ask something in return ‚Äì like sex. If you want to have a phone, we will save up together so you can make your own decisions without owing him anything.

rows.character_text: That makes sense, thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: That makes sense, thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: This makes me realise we should talk about boyfriends and protecting yourself. Many teens your age get pregnant or become HIV positive. Let‚Äôs go to the clinic so you can talk with the nurse to learn how you can stay safe.

character_text.eng: This makes me realise we should talk about boyfriends and protecting yourself. Many teens your age get pregnant or become HIV positive. Let‚Äôs go to the clinic so you can talk with the nurse to learn how you can stay safe.

rows.character_text: Okay, thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: Something happened when I was out with my friends @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name and @data.characters.friend_female_1.name!

character_text.eng: Something happened when I was out with my friends @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name and @data.characters.friend_female_1.name!

rows.character_text: Tell me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

character_text.eng: Tell me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

rows.character_text: Hey beautiful. I have been looking at you for a while. You are very beautiful, what is your name?

character_text.eng: Hey beautiful. I have been looking at you for a while. You are very beautiful, what is your name?

rows.character_text: Her name is @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

character_text.eng: Her name is @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, would you like to come with me to have something to drink and chips? Come on, get in, you will be back in time, I promise‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, would you like to come with me to have something to drink and chips? Come on, get in, you will be back in time, I promise‚Ä¶

rows.character_text: I am not sure if that is a good idea‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: I am not sure if that is a good idea‚Ä¶

rows.character_text: You are lucky, my friend. I wish a man would ask ME out and buy me gifts. I am telling you, if you do not do this I‚Äôm going to tell everyone you are stupid!

character_text.eng: You are lucky, my friend. I wish a man would ask ME out and buy me gifts. I am telling you, if you do not do this I‚Äôm going to tell everyone you are stupid!

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name do not go! Be careful! Let‚Äôs go home. It is dangerous to go with people you do not know. Besides, he is too old for you and what he is doing is wrong.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name do not go! Be careful! Let‚Äôs go home. It is dangerous to go with people you do not know. Besides, he is too old for you and what he is doing is wrong.

rows.character_text: I just do not know‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: I just do not know‚Ä¶

rows.character_text:
Pfff, I am so proud of you for not getting into the car. That was a dangerous situation, thank you for telling me!

You can always call me or talk to me when something like this happens. We can even use a Safety Word, so I know something is wrong - and I promise I will not be angry.

character_text.eng:
Pfff, I am so proud of you for not getting into the car. That was a dangerous situation, thank you for telling me!

You can always call me or talk to me when something like this happens. We can even use a Safety Word, so I know something is wrong - and I promise I will not be angry.

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name! Our Safety Word could be ‚Äòblue house‚Äô. I could call and say something like ‚ÄòI forgot my book at the blue house‚Äô and you would know to come help me.

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name! Our Safety Word could be ‚Äòblue house‚Äô. I could call and say something like ‚ÄòI forgot my book at the blue house‚Äô and you would know to come help me.

rows.character_text: My friend has been talking with a guy our age online... She is going to send him photos of herself. Is that better because he is our age?

character_text.eng: My friend has been talking with a guy our age online... She is going to send him photos of herself. Is that better because he is our age?

rows.character_text:
You are a good friend for being worried about her. Sending sexy photos is a real risk too.

Sometimes people are not who they say they are online ‚Äì he could say he is your age but be a 50-year-old man. Or when they break up, he could send those photos to everyone and your friend would feel awful.

character_text.eng:
You are a good friend for being worried about her. Sending sexy photos is a real risk too.

Sometimes people are not who they say they are online ‚Äì he could say he is your age but be a 50-year-old man. Or when they break up, he could send those photos to everyone and your friend would feel awful.

rows.character_text: I don't think I am ready..

character_text.eng: I don't think I am ready..

rows.character_text: Oh come on... We are ready for the next step. We see each other all the time and we never do anything more‚Ä¶ You know I love you, right!

character_text.eng: Oh come on... We are ready for the next step. We see each other all the time and we never do anything more‚Ä¶ You know I love you, right!

rows.character_text: Hi @data.characters.f3_daughter_12.name! I have 5 minutes of one-on-one time before I leave for work. What would you like to do together?

character_text.eng: Hi @data.characters.f3_daughter_12.name! I have 5 minutes of one-on-one time before I leave for work. What would you like to do together?

rows.character_text: I was about to do my Geography project. We have to find the capital cities of all the East African countries. Can you help me with that?

character_text.eng: I was about to do my Geography project. We have to find the capital cities of all the East African countries. Can you help me with that?

rows.character_text: I just wanted to‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: I just wanted to‚Ä¶

rows.character_text: Of course! How can I help?

character_text.eng: Of course! How can I help?

rows.character_text: No, you are staying here. You always leave me alone to go see your friends. Don‚Äôt you love me? Or are you meeting your other boyfriend?!

character_text.eng: No, you are staying here. You always leave me alone to go see your friends. Don‚Äôt you love me? Or are you meeting your other boyfriend?!

rows.character_text: Hey pretty, why are you walking so fast! Don‚Äôt you want to come show us what is under that skirt?

character_text.eng: Hey pretty, why are you walking so fast! Don‚Äôt you want to come show us what is under that skirt?

rows.character_text: Great! I can remember the countries, and you could write them down? Then we can look up the capitals on your phone.

character_text.eng: Great! I can remember the countries, and you could write them down? Then we can look up the capitals on your phone.

rows.character_text: Very good. Let‚Äôs do that.

character_text.eng: Very good. Let‚Äôs do that.

rows.character_text: Hi beautiful, can I buy you a snack?

character_text.eng: Hi beautiful, can I buy you a snack?

rows.character_text: Uhmmm... I don‚Äôt‚Ä¶

character_text.eng: Uhmmm... I don‚Äôt‚Ä¶

rows.character_text: Wow, you remembered all the countries! And you were so clever to find the capital cities using the phone.

character_text.eng: Wow, you remembered all the countries! And you were so clever to find the capital cities using the phone.

rows.character_text: Yes, she‚Äôll have it!

character_text.eng: Yes, she‚Äôll have it!

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. Can I go on TikTok now?

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. Can I go on TikTok now?

rows.character_text:
You can have 30 minutes on TikTok after you finish your homework. 
I would also love to try TikTok. Can you help me set up an account tomorrow?

character_text.eng:
You can have 30 minutes on TikTok after you finish your homework. 
I would also love to try TikTok. Can you help me set up an account tomorrow?

rows.character_text: Yes, of course! Then I can show you that cool video I told you about yesterday.

character_text.eng: Yes, of course! Then I can show you that cool video I told you about yesterday.

rows.character_text: Look, I still have this sexy picture that @data.characters.friend_female_2.name sent me! I will post it online, that should teach her not to break up with me.

character_text.eng: Look, I still have this sexy picture that @data.characters.friend_female_2.name sent me! I will post it online, that should teach her not to break up with me.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, if you want to get good grades this year you need to stay after school when everyone is gone so I can tutor you.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, if you want to get good grades this year you need to stay after school when everyone is gone so I can tutor you.

rows.character_text: My friend also needs support. Can I invite her too?

character_text.eng: My friend also needs support. Can I invite her too?

rows.character_text: No, this will be our secret. You don't want people to think you are stupid, right?

character_text.eng: No, this will be our secret. You don't want people to think you are stupid, right?

rows.character_text: No, I don't want to...

character_text.eng: No, I don't want to...

rows.character_text: Your friends left, so this is the only way you can get home, you idiot!

character_text.eng: Your friends left, so this is the only way you can get home, you idiot!

rows.character_text: Don‚Äôt tell the adults, but I am going to a bar with my friends tonight.

character_text.eng: Don‚Äôt tell the adults, but I am going to a bar with my friends tonight.

rows.character_text: Have fun! I told them I am staying with my girlfriend, but I am actually going to a cool party.

character_text.eng: Have fun! I told them I am staying with my girlfriend, but I am actually going to a cool party.

rows.character_text: I think they are dealing drugs. We could all get arrested. But I can‚Äôt tell my parents ‚Äì they will be so angry!

character_text.eng: I think they are dealing drugs. We could all get arrested. But I can‚Äôt tell my parents ‚Äì they will be so angry!

rows.character_text: I am scared. Everyone is too drunk to drive me home. This guy says he will take me, but he wants us to go to his house first. I can‚Äôt tell my parents ‚Äì I lied about coming to this party.

character_text.eng: I am scared. Everyone is too drunk to drive me home. This guy says he will take me, but he wants us to go to his house first. I can‚Äôt tell my parents ‚Äì I lied about coming to this party.

rows.character_text:
I care about your safety more than anything. If you are ever upset, or scared, you can always call me for help, or tell me about it.

Shall we use an imaginary ‚ÄòAunty Cecilia‚Äô as our Safety Word? Just say something about Aunty Cecilia, I promise that I will try my best to help and I will not be angry ‚Äì even if you are doing something you shouldn't be doing.

character_text.eng:
I care about your safety more than anything. If you are ever upset, or scared, you can always call me for help, or tell me about it.

Shall we use an imaginary ‚ÄòAunty Cecilia‚Äô as our Safety Word? Just say something about Aunty Cecilia, I promise that I will try my best to help and I will not be angry ‚Äì even if you are doing something you shouldn't be doing.

rows.character_text: Hey @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, how is Aunty Cecilia doing now?

character_text.eng: Hey @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, how is Aunty Cecilia doing now?

rows.character_text: *(on the other side of the phone)* Not well. We need you at home. I will come pick you up right away. Where are you?

character_text.eng: *(on the other side of the phone)* Not well. We need you at home. I will come pick you up right away. Where are you?

rows.character_text: (ü§î_thinking_) I think my friends are in trouble. I don‚Äôt want to stop being their friend, but I‚Äôm worried. Maybe @data.characters.f1_father.role_name knows what to do.

character_text.eng: (ü§î_thinking_) I think my friends are in trouble. I don‚Äôt want to stop being their friend, but I‚Äôm worried. Maybe @data.characters.f1_father.role_name knows what to do.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I just remembered, Aunty Cecilia said she will come visit tomorrow.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I just remembered, Aunty Cecilia said she will come visit tomorrow.

rows.character_text: *(on the other side of the phone)* Okay, I need you at home to help get things ready. I will come pick you up now. Where are you?

character_text.eng: *(on the other side of the phone)* Okay, I need you at home to help get things ready. I will come pick you up now. Where are you?

rows.character_text: Shame my dear, you look really upset, do you want to tell me what happened?

character_text.eng: Shame my dear, you look really upset, do you want to tell me what happened?

rows.character_text: It‚Äôs that man, he‚Ä¶ he‚Ä¶ he touched me.

character_text.eng: It‚Äôs that man, he‚Ä¶ he‚Ä¶ he touched me.

rows.character_text: (ü§î_thinking_) Oh no, this is terrible! Let me take a deep breath‚Ä¶ Now, what does my child need? She needs me to be calm and listen.

character_text.eng: (ü§î_thinking_) Oh no, this is terrible! Let me take a deep breath‚Ä¶ Now, what does my child need? She needs me to be calm and listen.

rows.character_text: Come and sit down next to me. Take your time, I am listening.

character_text.eng: Come and sit down next to me. Take your time, I am listening.

rows.character_text: Yesterday when you went to see your friend. He just came and that‚Äôs when it happened. He‚Ä¶ he‚Ä¶ he made me have sex with him! I did not want to, I swear, and I even said NO, but he told me I would be in trouble.

character_text.eng: Yesterday when you went to see your friend. He just came and that‚Äôs when it happened. He‚Ä¶ he‚Ä¶ he made me have sex with him! I did not want to, I swear, and I even said NO, but he told me I would be in trouble.

rows.character_text: Thank you for sharing this with me. I believe you. You are not in trouble. This is not your fault.

character_text.eng: Thank you for sharing this with me. I believe you. You are not in trouble. This is not your fault.

rows.character_text: Let‚Äôs decide together what to do. Your @data.characters.f2_grandfather.name loves you and he would want to help. Are you okay with it if I call him?

character_text.eng: Let‚Äôs decide together what to do. Your @data.characters.f2_grandfather.name loves you and he would want to help. Are you okay with it if I call him?

rows.character_text: Yes, that‚Äôs a good idea.

character_text.eng: Yes, that‚Äôs a good idea.

rows.character_text: I am so sorry this happened to you, my child. We are here to support you. What you shared is important. We will find a way to get the help we need. I think it would be a good idea to go to the clinic, so they can do a check-up to make sure you are okay. What do you think about that?

character_text.eng: I am so sorry this happened to you, my child. We are here to support you. What you shared is important. We will find a way to get the help we need. I think it would be a good idea to go to the clinic, so they can do a check-up to make sure you are okay. What do you think about that?

rows.character_text: Yes‚Ä¶ Okay‚Ä¶ But will you come with me?

character_text.eng: Yes‚Ä¶ Okay‚Ä¶ But will you come with me?

rows.character_text: Of course I will. And @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name? Remember this is not your fault. I love you. You are a good person. We will get through this.

character_text.eng: Of course I will. And @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name? Remember this is not your fault. I love you. You are a good person. We will get through this.

rows.character_text: I have never done this before. And now they will expel me.

character_text.eng: I have never done this before. And now they will expel me.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I am so ashamed. I do not know what to do.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I am so ashamed. I do not know what to do.

rows.character_text: I do not want to have a baby.

character_text.eng: I do not want to have a baby.

rows.character_text: The test said I have HIV. I am scared I am going to die.

character_text.eng: The test said I have HIV. I am scared I am going to die.

rows.character_text: I didn't really want to. Now I will get pregnant or be ill. @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, I am so scared...

character_text.eng: I didn't really want to. Now I will get pregnant or be ill. @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, I am so scared...
